abstract: An operation that writes an autosave version of the file to a different location.
overview:
## Discussion

For an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument] subclass that overrides [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/autosavesInPlace] to have the value [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], this is used during autosaving of documents that have never been saved and therefore do not yet have a document file that can be overwritten during autosaving. `NSDocument` may also pass `NSAutosaveElsewhereOperation` when invoking `writeSafelyToURL:ofType:forSaveOperation:error:` while duplicating or reverting a document.

# NSDocument.SaveOperationType.autosaveElsewhereOperation

**Case**

An operation that writes an autosave version of the file to a different location.

## Declaration

```swift
case autosaveElsewhereOperation
```

## Discussion

For an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument] subclass that overrides [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDocument/autosavesInPlace] to have the value [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], this is used during autosaving of documents that have never been saved and therefore do not yet have a document file that can be overwritten during autosaving. `NSDocument` may also pass `NSAutosaveElsewhereOperation` when invoking `writeSafelyToURL:ofType:forSaveOperation:error:` while duplicating or reverting a document.

## Constants

- **NSDocument.SaveOperationType.saveOperation**: An operation that overwrites a document’s file or file package with the document’s contents.
- **NSDocument.SaveOperationType.saveAsOperation**: An operation that writes the document’s contents to a new location and updates the document to point to that location
- **NSDocument.SaveOperationType.saveToOperation**: An operation that writes a copy of the document’s contents to the specified location, without changing the original document’s location.
- **NSDocument.SaveOperationType.autosaveInPlaceOperation**: An operation that overwrites the document’s current contents with autosave data.
- **NSDocument.SaveOperationType.autosaveAsOperation**: An operation that writes a document’s contents to a new file or file package even though the user has not explicitly requested it, then changes the document’s current location to point to the just-written file or file package.
